page.title: 10ATTITUDES IN KEYINGHAM AREAS
page.content: Unemployment is a major concern, formany years the effects of mechanized farming has been felt with fewer and fewer local people being needed. Now trades that some of these people had turned to have also been cut causing have also been cut causing large unemployment. Everyone has been effected skilled and unskilled, qualified and unqualified. It would now seem something we have to live with and adjust to and perhaps change our attitudes to as it still regarded by some as a stigma to be without a job. Being a largely farming area, changing methods of crop spraying, removal of hedgrows and trees, stubble burning, subsidised crop production - leading to over population of certain crops (grain mountains), intensive or battery farming of animals, all these and more are giving cause for concern,
